name: BCBS Cascade Operator
description: Advanced orchestration agent for multi-agent workflows in the BCBS_Values system with enhanced MPC protocol
_comment_trigger: Phrase or command that activates this orchestration agent
_comment_versioning: Version control information and compatibility requirements

change_history.changes: Enhanced inter-agent communication protocol, added calibration data and error reporting
Comprehensive update with enhanced MPC protocol, expanded error handling, and unified workflow orchestration
Major protocol overhaul with advanced calibration, secure parameter exchange, and standardized error handling framework
Enhanced protocol with improved versioning, enhanced calibration data, detailed error logs, precise timestamp handling, and expanded workflow orchestration capabilities
Implemented comprehensive JSON-based protocol for inter-agent communication with standardized sample messages, expanded workflow orchestration, and improved error handling

_comment_registry: Registry of all available agents that can be coordinated by this operator

inter_agent_communication_protocol.name: BCBS-MPC-Protocol
inter_agent_communication_protocol.description: Enhanced Multi-Protocol Calibration (MPC) system for standardized agent communication with advanced security, versioning, and precise timestamp handling

header.message_type: enum (command, event, data, status, parameter, calibration, error, heartbeat)
header.protocol_version: string (semantic version of protocol in use)
header.causation_id: string (UUID of the message that caused this one)
header.flow_id: string (identifier for the business process flow)

metadata.retention_policy: string (how long to keep this message)

calibration_data.description: Enhanced configuration for model calibration data and parameter management

data_sets.description: Baseline calibration dataset for model validation
GIS-specific calibration data for spatial models
Holdout dataset for final validation of models

error_reporting.description: Comprehensive structured error reporting system for agent operations

workflow_orchestration.description: Configuration for workflow orchestration across agents

end_to_end_valuation_workflow.description: Complete workflow from data acquisition to valuation model deployment

sample_messages.description: Sample message formats for inter-agent communication

content.message: Computing spatial features from GIS data layers
GIS data quality threshold not met for flood zone layer

resolution.recommended_action: Manually verify flood zone data coverage and source for missing tracts
resolution.retry_strategy: After manual data verification and correction
